definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: He's more of an outpatient and you're his keeper .
sentences.chinese: 他更像是個門診病人，而你是他的護理。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the utilization of narcotic analgesics in our hospital.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解我院門診麻醉性鎮痛藥的使用情況。

sentences.english: Objective To explore nurses' techniques in communicating with patients in paediatrics out-patient clinic triage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討兒科門診分診護士溝通的技巧。

sentences.english: Application of ozone injections on the paravertebral muscles, as an outpatient.
sentences.chinese: 應用臭氧注射液對椎旁肌肉，作爲門診。

sentences.english: In fact, now to the hair out-patient treatment, but also many young people.
sentences.chinese: 其實，現在來毛髮門診看病的，也多是年輕人。

sentences.english: General out-patient attendances refer to cases seen by doctors.
sentences.chinese: 普通科門診到診人次指由醫生診治的個案。

sentences.english: More than 100 outpatient specialty clinics are located at Children's.
sentences.chinese: 超過100個門診專科診所位於兒童。

sentences.english: Dr. Albert Schweitzer's vocation led him to set up a medical clinic in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 史懷哲醫生的在非洲開了個小門診。

sentences.english: Corneal epithelial injury is one of the most common keratopathy in external ophthalmopathy.
sentences.chinese: 角膜上皮損傷疾病是眼科門診最常見的角膜病變之一。

sentences.english: Important figures of performance of in- and outpatient medical care can be derived from these data.
sentences.chinese: 重要人物的表現中和門診醫療服務可從這些數據。

sentences.english: So this kind of anesthesia method is applicable completely to the policlinic induced abortion operations.
sentences.chinese: 所以這種麻醉方法適用於門診人工流產手術。

sentences.english: Social Hygiene Service is a specialist clinical service for sexually transmitted infection in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 社會衛生科診所是香港公營的性病門診服務。

sentences.english: “My goal is to turn an acute-care emergency patient into an outpatient,” he declared.
sentences.chinese: “我的目標是把急診病人轉入門診部，”他說。

sentences.english: Twenty-one endocrinologists conducted specialty outpatient metabolic consultations.
sentences.chinese: 位內分泌學專家接受門診病人的特別諮詢。

sentences.english: up to 60% of outpatient health clinic visits.
sentences.chinese: 高達衛生診所門診病人的60%。

sentences.english: Objective Discuss the use of queuing system at out-patient treatment system to optimization process.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討利用分診排隊系統來優化門診就醫流程。

definition: to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
abbr. for 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
